name: zplc-ide
description: ZPLC IDE - Industrial PLC Development Environment
author: ZPLC Team

scripts.electron:compile: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json && mv electron-dist/preload.js electron-dist/preload.cjs
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron:compile && NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:preview: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron .
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --linux
